root: ^On the side, there's a red sharpie line marking the recommended daily fluid intake.
^Next to the line there's a sticker with a happy rubber duck on it, sporting the words "Go With the Flow!"
^That’s a lot less liquid than you remember needing.
^And you can see small bubbles rising to the surface of it.
^It smells faintly of berries in the way that LaCroix barely ever does.
